supabase/migrations/008_guidelines.sql.description: Guidelines table migration with content, metadata columns and match_guidelines() RPC function. Uses HNSW index for vector similarity search with cosine distance.

backend/data_processing/loaders/guidelin.description: All logger calls use structured kwargs with step, filename, and error context for JSON output. Logger.error() accepts error= parameter for exception object (not string). Follow pattern from backend/services/logger.py.

backend/app/services/search_service.py.description: search_guidelines() implements vector search pattern: embed query → RPC match_guidelines → format results with citation metadata (source, page, similarity). Uses EmbeddingGenerator for query embedding, falls back to keyword ilike search.
